heroTitle: Experience the Power of AI with Airisto
heroTitle1: The Most Reliable Way to Detect AI-Generated Text
heroDesc: Detect AI-generated texts with % accuracy. Analysis, reasoning, and reliable results in a single step.
contentDesc: An all-in-one platform to detect AI-generated content and verify authenticity within minutes
contentDesc2: Analyze texts, documents, and articles to verify whether they were generated by AI.
mockIndicator1: Repetitive sentence structures and predictable transitions typical of AI-generated content
mockIndicator2: Limited idiomatic expressions with vocabulary that appears unnaturally consistent
mockIndicator3: Content maintains topic coherence but shows signs of general information density
mockIndicator4: Word frequency distribution closely matches known AI text generation models
provideDesc: An all-in-one platform to analyze content and verify its authenticity within minutes
provideLongDesc: The impact of AI on modern society cannot be overstated. It has revolutionized numerous industries and transformed the way we live and work. From healthcare to transportation, AI technologies are driving innovation and efficiency. The potential benefits of AI, including increased productivity, improved decision-making, and enhanced problem-solving capabilities, are immense. However, there are also concerns about job displacement, privacy issues, and ethical considerations. As AI continues to advance, it is crucial for society to address these challenges while harnessing the technology's potential...
provideResultTitle3: Precisely verify the authenticity of text
provideResultDesc: Our advanced AI detection engine analyzes text patterns, linguistic markers, and structural elements to identify AI-generated content.
provideWhyTitle: Why do we think this was generated by AI?
provideResultReason1: Highly consistent tone throughout the entire document
provideResultReason2: Lacks personal perspective or unique insights
provideResultReason3: Contains patterns commonly found in LLM outputs
hiwDesc: We are passionate about leveraging the power of advanced algorithms and machine learning to detect AI-generated content with exceptional accuracy. Our state-of-the-art AI Detection technology is designed to analyze patterns, identify markers, and verify the authenticity of any text.
hiwStep1Desc: Our system accepts a wide range of content formats, including plain text, documents, articles, essays, and more. Simply paste your text or upload a document to initiate the analysis process. Our platform handles content of any length, from short paragraphs to full academic papers.
hiwStep2Desc: Our detection algorithms examine linguistic patterns, stylistic inconsistencies, and structural elements that distinguish AI-generated text. We analyze sentence diversity, word usage, tone consistency, and numerous specific markers to identify content produced by large language models.
hiwStep3Desc: Receive comprehensive reports showing the probability of AI generation with percentage distributions of specific indicators. Our results provide actionable insights into why text appears human or machine-written, helping educators, publishers, and content managers make informed decisions.
pricingTitle: Choose the Plan That Suits Your Needs
pricingSubtitle: Select the plan that best fits your content verification needs
ctaTitle2: Detect AI-generated texts with % accuracy. Analysis, reasoning, and reliable results in a single step.
faqQ1: What does this AI detection do?
faqA1: This application helps determine how much of the entered text or documents were written by AI.
faqA2: Advanced machine learning models and natural language processing techniques are used to analyze signs of AI generation in the text.
faqQ3: Which file types can I analyze?
faqA3: We currently support .txt, .docx, and .pdf files. Support for more formats will be added soon.
faqA4: Our model has a high accuracy rate, but 100% certainty is not guaranteed. It is recommended to use it alongside human review.
faqQ5: Is there a free plan available?
faqA5: There is currently no free plan available.
faqDesc: Our support team, assisted by AI-powered suggestions, will handle support requests faster than ever.
